ellis.king.directors: Hi Greta, I thought this could be a good suggestion. I really admire what you are doing, but I feel that you should use your power to focus on what people CAN do instead of always looking at government for the answers. I encourage you to watch 'The Biggest Little Farm' to see how everyday people turned unusable land into a thriving ecosystem in just 7 years. If we turn our attention to solutions we may get through this. Government will always have their own agenda. They will use your campaigning to tax the poor and nothing will change. You have a unique position of power, look at where you can focus the human race and when we can start changing things on a macro level, and then we will be able to shift the big things. We need to make government work for us, not the other way around.
